tha-ap364:1.2_0: Sir, Vacchagotta, and you are satisfied with Master Gotama.
tha-ap364:2.2_0: to see the word of the Buddha.
tha-ap364:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap364:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap364:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kakkaṭa.
tha-ap364:5.1_0: The second part of the senior monks have been sentenced to death.
